name: BlockJumper (Huge Update)🎉🎉
description:
Welcome to BlockJumper!

🎉

We just released a new update with "Music and new Levels"

We Hope you like the new update! Stay tuned for new and cool updates!

🎉

 to play the game you have to install the game on your pc!

 after that you have to click "play!" then you can have fun playing the game :D  

The controls a "A" and "D"
